items.sentence: You are late. The meeting finished thirty minutes ago.
Tom forwarded the email he received from Mary to John.
Tom gave his dog a piece of leftover Christmas turkey.
Tom gave his three-year-old son a puppy for Christmas.
We have got to get him to take that project seriously.
Mary went over to the United States in her late teens.
During the break, I went to look for Tom in the lobby.
Tom clearly wasn\'t listening to what Mary was saying.
This would taste a lot better with a little more salt.
Will Tom still be able to do that after the operation?
With a little more patience, you would have succeeded.
Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary was hoping he\'d kiss her.
Tom wished he could tell Mary about what had happened.
Tom wished he could tell Mary what she wanted to know.
Tom and Mary were sitting in the back seat of the car.
Tom and Mary were watching television when I got home.
The only problem was that Tom didn\'t want to be here.
Tom knew that Mary couldn\'t do what she wanted to do.
Tom never admits he\'s wrong even when he knows he is.
Tom dropped out of the race when he fell off his bike.
